name: Avoid excessive number of successive nested Procedure calls  and limit it to two  (PL1)
description: This rule searches all the PL1 Functions and PL1 Procedures using a number superior to two of successive nested procedures calls.
output:
The report lists all the PL1 Functions and PL1 Procedures using  a large number of successive nested procedures calls.  

It provides following information: 
-  PL1 Functions and PL1 Procedures full name
rationale: Using a large number of successive nested procedures call can make very difficult the readability and the understanding of the source code.
remediation: Try to reduce the number of successive nested procedures calls.
total: Number of PL1 Functions and PL1 Procedures
